SEARCH
Module org.jaspr.hr.demo
Package org.jaspr.hr.demo

Class SqliteUserDAO

java.lang.Object
org.jaspr.hr.demo.SqliteUserDAO
public class SqliteUserDAO extends Object
DAO class for managing user data in an SQLite database. Handles creation of user tables and CRUD operations for students, teachers, and admins.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SqliteUserDAO()
    Constructor initialises the SQLite connection and creates all required tables.

  • Method Details

    • addStudent

      public void addStudent(Student student, String password, String salt)
      Inserts a student into the database.
      Parameters:
      student - the student object to add
      password - the hashed password
      salt - the salt used for hashing

    • addTeacher

      public void addTeacher(Teacher teacher, String password, String salt)
      Adds a new teacher to the database.
      Parameters:
      teacher - the teacher object to add
      password - the hashed password
      salt - the salt used for hashing

      salt - the salt used for hashing

    • getLoggedInUser

      public Object getLoggedInUser(String email, String password, String role)
      Authenticates and returns a user object (Student, Teacher, or Admin) based on role, email, and password.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email
      password - the hashed password
      role - the role of the user: "Student", "Teacher", or "Admin"
      Returns:
      the matching user object as an Object (cast as needed), or null if not found

    • Authenticate

      public String Authenticate(String email, String password)
      Authenticates provided email and password against database of registered users
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email
      password - the hashed password
      Returns:
      role "Student", "Teacher", or "Admin" if found, otherwise null

    • getSalt

      public String getSalt(String email)
      Retrieves the salt for a given user's email.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email
      Returns:
      the salt string or null if not found

    • changePassword

      public boolean changePassword(String email, String oldPassword, String newPassword, String role)
      Changes the password for a user after verifying the old password.
      Parameters:
      email - the user's email
      oldPassword - the current hashed password
      newPassword - the new hashed password
      role - the user's role
      Returns:
      true if the password was changed successfully, false otherwise

    • getAllStudents

      public List<Student> getAllStudents()
      Retrieves all students from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all Student objects

    • getAllTeachers

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Teacher> getAllTeachers()
      Retrieves all teachers from the database.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList of all Teacher objects

    • hasAnyStudents

      public boolean hasAnyStudents()
      Checks if there are any students in the database.
      Returns:
      true if at least one student exists, false otherwise
